trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Culver City
There was one other sighting in Culver City on or around June 21st 2006
Summary: went out back to investigate low rumble/one of the dogs followed/we both looked up to see a large diamond shoot by.
divs: sighting detailsabout 3:30-4:00a.m., on 6\21\06, i heard a low but powerful rumble. living near a small airport and in the flight path, it is not uncommon to hear small crafts fly by. my land lord and i have an ongoing game where we guess from the sound, what kind of plane is passing. after years of this we only guess or comment on unusual sounds i.e., military, goodyear blimp. rollo,a large pitbull, always gives away the blimp because he gets very upset and aggressive at it. i hear this rumble that i first thought was an earthquake,that's how low but powerful it was. when i noticed no shaking, i said to myself, "what the hell kind of jet is this?". i ran out the back door to see what direction it was coming from, turned out to be coming from the south and getting louder. there was a low and light cloud cover and just above it i see lights coming fast! as it passed overhead i see 14 to 16 lights that outlined the craft. i could see no color. whatever it was, i mean it was moving! rollo and i watched it pass. i called bob's name,i don't know why, there was no way he could have made it outside to see, but he did hear me. after it passed i looked at rollo and he looked at me as if he were looking for some kind of clue on how he should react. i remaind calm but was really impressed by the speed. i tried to tell myself that it must have been some kind of stealth or something. it was then that i reallized, "wait, the craft was long gone and as it passed over, i heard no sound from it. i could still hear the rumble coming from the south so i kept watching to see if someone was giving chase. the rumble just faded and never came any closer. my first imprssion was...it just felt like an e.t. sight seeing tour bus. as time went on, it kept bugging me, i looked for answers. as far as i know, if it had lights at all, a stealth would be triangle not diamond. i tried to guess the size but had nothing to compare it to. we can also see 747s going in and out of lax. so the next one that came along gave me a better idea of the size of the diamond. even though it was much lower than the jets, it had to be at least two to three times the size of a 747. i'm not to knowledgeable about our military craft but it seems to me that 2-3 times lager than a 747 takes the stealth out of the picture. i have seen several u.f.o.s over the years from late '60s to present. from small balls of light bouncing to a craft that was as big a city. but this is the first i've wittnessed an event alone, w\ the exception of rollo. and this is also the first time i've ever reported one. i really wanted to call the police dept. or something, but i just kept feeling that chance are no one else saw it. because of the time of morning and the speed it was going, what are the chances that someone else saw it too.
